metadata.title: CVE-2020-24750 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: FasterXML jackson-databind 2.x before 2.9.10.6 mishandles the interaction between serialization gadgets and typing, related to com.pastdev.httpcomponents.configuration.JndiConfiguration.

notes.note: sbeattie> according to debian, mitigated in 2.10 series (focal) and newer as Safe Default Typing is enabled by default but still an issue when Default Typing is enabled.

criterions.comment: jackson-databind package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
